data.text:
Welcome to Delek US

We are a downstream energy company with a passion for growth and a commitment to operating safely, reliably, and ethically.

You can depend on Delek.

Our areas of expertise

Refining

We specialize in petroleum refining, with the ability to process 302,000 barrels per day of crude oil from our four U.S. refineries.

Read more →

Logistics

We are expert handlers of crude oil and refined production, via our extensive gathering, transportation and storage network.

Read more →

Retail

We operate approximately 260 convenience stores in the southwest U.S.

Read more →

Partnering With Us

Our job is to make you successful.

Careers

Join our high-caliber, high-performance team.

Our job is to make you successful.

Join our high-caliber, high-performance team.

We are committed to protecting the environment and improving our impact on the world around us.

Read more →

We disclose our environmental, social and governance (ESG) reports, policies and performance to improve our transparency and accountability.

Read more →

Safety is our top priority, and our training and programs are aimed at encouraging employees to take personal ownership of safety.

Read more →

Our signature program for charitable contributions has raised millions of dollars for worthy causes in our local communities.
